title: Ritz's Dream
description: The title theme for the game.

title: Ritz's Dream (DX version)
description: The title theme for the game, but the DX version of it. Kawaisprite is pretty cool.

title: Frozen Cheese
description: This is the song that plays when you play the game. I don't know what else to add.

title: Frozen Cheese (DX version)
description: This is the DX remake of Frozen Cheese. It's got all that god damn classic shit yo. Bumping my boys. Can you believe it?

title: Ritz The Rat!
description: The credits theme for the game.

title: Ultra Cheddar!
description: The main menu music for the game. Introduced in the DX version of the game. Pretty awesome.
